content: Wandering Wight's Spirit Power is called **Faithful Kowtow**. Faithful Kowtow allows you to take the form of Wandering Wight and ram his head into enemies, dealing them massive damage. This is one of the best Spirit Powers, and it holds up throughout the entire game. Wandering Wight's Power can also be used to destroy the wall leading to a secret area in the First Prince of Flowing Sands arena.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Wandering_Wight_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Wandering Wight Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Wandering Wight Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
Wandering Wight's Spirit Power is called **Faithful Kowtow**. Faithful Kowtow allows you to take the form of Wandering Wight and ram his head into enemies, dealing them massive damage. This is one of the best Spirit Powers, and it holds up throughout the entire game. Wandering Wight's Power can also be used to destroy the wall leading to a secret area in the First Prince of Flowing Sands arena.
